captions.text: So, uh...I thought this game couldn't get any funnier, and, um, uhh....
Someone told me to turn on the Bobblehead option, so, um...
I'm gonna let him go. I'm just gonna let him go do his thing.
Oh, he's not gonna go anywhere! You son of a b****.
You handsome son of a b****, you!
What is the point of this?
Let us try an slightly different path, you handsome devil.
Oh, you look very happy about that situation there, buddy!
Alright! Take...wow. Really? Are you kidding me?
Aww, how could I be mad at you?
You don't feel so good, do ya?
Where did I go? What happened to me?
All I see are flying cars!
Why is it so funny to see my face being tossed around like that?
All right. Oh, you came back...Oh, God!
What happened to you?! Tell me, who hurt you like this?!
What is happening to that?! Euhuhugh! Stop!
I feel more personal connection now!
It's okay, buddy, I'll meet you at the---
Oh, is that your foot there or are you happy to see me?
Did something happen to you? Oh, you just so sexy right now...
Hey, there, friend! How's it going? You look a little worried.
Why ain't ya going up--There's the happiness!
I'm like--He's like; You like what you see, baby?
That's why I go the fly! (or something)
Wait, OH, NO! There was more! I'm sorry! I'M SO SORRY--!
Oh, you're okay...It's gonna be all right! Look at that smile!
Did anyone ever doubt that smile?
I can't deal with this...I can't deal with it!
This is by far - by far - the silliest thing I have ever done in my life.
This...is ri-god-d***-diculous, but it is so amazing!
Am-Am I gonna be okay, doctor?!
This level is literally called "Wall of Train".
I dunno what I expected. Honestly.
Where, oh, where...could my face have gone?
I didn't see--Oh! Oh, is that it? Oh, is that it?!
Aw, yeah, my guy's ready to go!
All right, now don't do whatever the hell happened before again.
Okay--!! Where did my face go---No, no, no!!
I found him! I don't know where he's going but I found him!
Come on, baby! You can make it!
You ready for the ride of your life, buddy?
I wonder what will happen now.
But he still looks happy! And slightly confused.
Let's see what you can do! Oh, you missed the train!
You didn't miss that! <i>Le laugh. Again.</i> Okay...
Reminds me of me when I was an kid.
I used to get stuck in those things all the time! Oh, me...
I think you just severed your crotch.
Ready for a fun ride?! Oh, my God...!
Oh, you almost had that! Oh, what is going on with your arms?!
Looking good, buddy. Oh, looking good! You're gonna make it!
Uh...Uh, dude?! You left your a** twitching in that bird!
This is more my speed and style.
Come on, little buddy! Make it all the way! That is--
Wait a minute, wait a minute, wait a minute...HIIIIII!
I swear, the stupidest things make me laugh, no matter what.
But, god d*** it, I love it. God, this is flipping hilarious!
And I'm still happy! All right!
All right, guys, that was more Turbo Dismount.
With my face, and holy crap, that was absolutely amazing.
I don't know why I found it so funny,
but if you guys enjoyed it and you want to see more Turbo Dismount,
especially if you wanna see it with my face on there--Hello, there!
Let me know about it by leaving an Like down below.
Thank you all so much for watching, and as always...
I will see you...in the next video.
